mapper.insert: insert into "order"(order_status_id, customer_name, customer_phone, customer_comment) values(#{ord.orderStatusId}, #{ord.customerName}, #{ord.customerPhone}, #{ord.customerComment})
mapper.select: select ord.id, order_status_id, customer_name, customer_phone, customer_comment from "order" as ord inner join order_item as oi on oi.order_id = ord.id
select ord.id, order_status_id, customer_name, customer_phone, customer_comment from "order" as ord inner join order_item as oi on oi.order_id = ord.id where ord.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update "order" set order_status_id = #{ord.orderStatusId}, customer_name = #{ord.customerName}, customer_phone = #{ord.customerPhone}, customer_comment = #{ord.customerComment} where id = #{ord.id}
mapper.delete: delete from "order" as ord where ord.id = #{id}
